medium: Opaque watercolor and gold on paper
title: A Jain Guru Gives a Sermon
text: An inscription in the upper border identifies the monk as Guru Gajendravijayaji. He wears a protective veil over his mouth while giving a sermon to an assembly of devotees, who are segregated by gender in traditional Indian fashion.
creditline: Gift of funds from Mr. and Mrs. Charles Cleveland and Helen Winton Jones
